comments.body:
`HTableSettings` is used as method parameter in `javadsl` and the scala function is not java friendly in Scala 2.11

I suggest that you add a java friendly factory method in the companion of `HTableSettings`, or use two different `scaladsl.HTableSettings` and `javadsl.HTableSettings`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@                                   tableName: TableName,
                                   columnFamilies: immutable.Seq[String],
                                   converter: T => Put)

object HTableSettings {
